text: Ladenbergia is a genus of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It contains the following species (but this list is incomplete): * Ladenbergia acutifolia, (Ruiz & Pav.) Klotzsch * Ladenbergia ferruginea, Standl. * Ladenbergia gavanensis, (Schltdl.) Standl. * Ladenbergia hexandra * Ladenbergia moritziana Klotzsch * Ladenbergia nubigena, L. Andersson * Ladenbergia pavonii, (Lamb.) Standl. * Ladenbergia rubiginosa, L. Andersson * Ladenbergia stenocarpa, (Lambert) Klotzsch * Ladenbergia ulei, Standl. == References == Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ladenbergia
